name: Ceum cladaich agus Orchard Wood / Coastal Path and Orchard Wood

ai.summary: A gentle 4.9 km coastal woodland hike in the UK, weaving together the Ceum cladaich agus Orchard Wood route with the Coastal Path and Orchard Wood. This easy route offers sea views, shaded woodland sections and a relaxing pace suitable for beginners and families.
ai.terrain_summary: Mostly easy and well-defined paths, combining coastal track with woodland trails through Orchard Wood. Expect a mix of compact soil, gravel and occasional uneven ground; some shaded sections and gentle slopes.
ai.safety_notes: Always check the weather and tide conditions before you go, as coastal sections can be exposed to wind and spray. Wear sturdy footwear with good grip and dress in layers; the UK coast can be changeable. Bring water and a snack; carry a light waterproof layer. Stay on marked paths, watch for uneven ground, roots and loose gravel, and mind other walkers, cyclists, and wildlife. In winter, be aware of stronger winds and shorter daylight hours.
recommended_gear: Sturdy walking shoes or boots with good grip
ai.best_seasons: Spring to autumn offer the most comfortable conditions for coastal walking; the route is suitable year-round with proper gear in winter.

seo.title: Ceum cladaich agus Orchard Wood / Coastal Path and Orchard Wood – 4.9 km Easy Coastal Hike in the UK
seo.meta_description: Discover a gentle 4.9 km coastal and woodland trail in the UK, linking Ceum cladaich agus Orchard Wood with the Coastal Path and Orchard Wood. Easy terrain, sea views, and shaded woodland.
